alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:55PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harney County through 545 PM PDT... At 454 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andrews, or 34 miles north of Denio, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Spotter report. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alvord Hot Springs around 510 PM PDT. Wildhorse Lake around 530 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
